description: A dashboard for OpenStack Octavia load balancer metrics

panels.description: Percent CPU utilization. Displays the maximum value if multiple load balancers are selected.
panels.title: CPU Load

panels.description: Percent RAM utilization. Displays the maximum value if multiple load balancers are selected.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Instant read of the current number of connections per second across the selected load balancers.
panels.title: Load Balancer(s) CPS

panels.description: Instant read of the current throughput across the selected load balancers.
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description:
Shows the percentage of members in each state across the selected load balancers.
Options are: Online, Offline (admin down/disabled),  Error, or Draining.
panels.title: Member Status

panels.description: The maximum observed connections per second and requests per second across the selected load balancers. Values may reset on load balancer configuration change or failover.
panels.title: Peak Rates

panels.description: Traffic flow logs dropped due to system load.
panels.title: Logs Dropped

panels.description: The current listener status. 0=Offline, 1=Online, 2=Degraded (at the configured capacity).
panels.title: Listener Status

panels.description: The maximum observed concurrent sessions, sessions per second, and requests per second across the selected listeners. Values may reset on load balancer configuration change or failover.
panels.title: Peak Values

panels.description: The current pool status. 0=Error, 1=Online
panels.title: Pool Status

panels.description: The maximum observed concurrent sessions, sessions per second, and queued requests across the selected pools. Values may reset on load balancer configuration change or failover.
panels.title: Peak Values

panels.description: The rate at which the client aborted the connection. I.e. the user closed the browser window.
panels.title: Client Abort Rate

panels.description: Rate that the backend member servers are aborting connections.
panels.title: Member Server Abort Rate

panels.description: The current maximum time across the selected pools. Values may reset on load balancer configuration change or failover.
panels.title: Current Maximum Times

panels.description: The maximum observed time across the selected pools. Values may reset on load balancer configuration change or failover.
panels.title: Peak Times

panels.description: Average queue time for last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Average Queue Time

panels.description: Average connect time for last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Average Connect Time

panels.description: Average response time for last 1024 successful connections. Inclusive of member server time.
panels.title: Average Response Time

panels.description: Average total time for last 1024 successful connections. Inclusive of member server time.
panels.title: Average Total Time

panels.description:
Shows the percentage of members in each state across the selected load balancers.
Options are: Online, Offline (admin down/disabled),  Error, or Draining.
panels.title: Member Status

panels.description: The maximum observed concurrent sessions, sessions per second, and queued requests across the selected members. Values may reset on load balancer configuration change or failover.
panels.title: Peak Values

panels.description: The rate at which the client aborted the connection. I.e. the user closed the browser window.
panels.title: Client Abort Rate

panels.description: Rate that the backend member servers are aborting connections.
panels.title: Member Server Abort Rate

panels.description: Failed check rate. (Only counts checks failed when the member is up).
panels.title: Member Health Check Failure Rate

panels.description: Current throttle percentage for the member, when slowstart is active, or no value if not in slowstart.
panels.title: Member Throttle

panels.description: The current maximum time across the selected members. Values may reset on load balancer configuration change or failover.
panels.title: Current Maximum Times

panels.description: The maximum observed time across the selected members. Values may reset on load balancer configuration change or failover.
panels.title: Peak Times

panels.description: Average queue time for last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Average Queue Time

panels.description: Average connect time for last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Average Connect Time

panels.description: Average response time for last 1024 successful connections. Inclusive of member server time.
panels.title: Average Response Time

panels.description: Average total time for last 1024 successful connections. Inclusive of member server time.
panels.title: Average Total Time

title: OpenStack Octavia Amphora Load Balancer
